languages.text: "Он говорил про Инцидент — было ясно, что это нечто с большой буквы — как о некоем событии в прошлом, когда корабль потряс массивный сбой всех систем. Всех вообще — они перестали отвечать на запросы на одну пятую долю секунды. Большинство команды — включая меня, ведь я наверняка тоже была на борту — ничего не заметили. Но техножрецы чувствительны к таким вещам".

"He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."
languages.original_text: "Он говорил про Инцидент — было ясно, что это нечто с большой буквы — как о некоем событии в прошлом, когда корабль потряс массивный сбой всех систем. Всех вообще — они перестали отвечать на запросы на одну пятую долю секунды. Большинство команды — включая меня, ведь я наверняка тоже была на борту — ничего не заметили. Но техножрецы чувствительны к таким вещам".

traits.locale_text: "He described the Incident — and it was clear from the way he spoke the word was capitalized — as an event in the past when the entire ship was hit by a massive systems failure. All of the systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, involving myself because I was probably on board at that time, did not notice anything amiss. But tech-priests are sensitive to such things."

"He described the Incident — and it was clear from the way he spoke the word was capitalized — as an event in the past when the entire ship was hit by a massive systems failure. All of the systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, involving myself because I was probably on board at that time, did not notice anything amiss. But tech-priests are sensitive to such things."

"He was describing it as 'the Incident', something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

"He was describing it as 'the Incident', something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

"He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

"He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

languages.text: « Il en a parlé en utilisant le terme "incident", le décrivant comme quelque chose d'assez extraordinaire. Apparemment, le vaisseau tout entier a subi une panne massive de tous ses systèmes et tout s'est arrêté en l'espace d'un cinquième de seconde. Personne dans l'équipage, moi y compris, n'a rien remarqué d'inhabituel. Pourtant, les technoprêtres sont sensibles à ce genre de choses... »
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: « Il en a parlé en utilisant le terme "incident", le décrivant comme quelque chose d'assez extraordinaire. Apparemment, le vaisseau tout entier a subi une panne massive de tous ses systèmes et tout s'est arrêté en l'espace d'un cinquième de seconde. Personne dans l'équipage, moi y compris, n'a rien remarqué d'inhabituel. Pourtant, les technoprêtres sont sensibles à ce genre de choses... »

languages.text: “既然他多次提到那起事故，那肯定是件非常严重的事情。显然，在过去的某个时间段，整艘飞船都发生了严重的系统故障。所有系统都在五分之一秒内失灵了。不过，当时在船上的绝大部分船员，甚至可能包括我自己在内，都没有注意过任何奇怪的事情。不过，技术神甫对这类事情总是很敏感。”
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: “既然他多次提到那起事故，那肯定是件非常严重的事情。显然，在过去的某个时间段，整艘飞船都发生了严重的系统故障。所有系统都在五分之一秒内失灵了。不过，当时在船上的绝大部分船员，甚至可能包括我自己在内，都没有注意过任何奇怪的事情。不过，技术祭司对这类事情总是很敏感。”

languages.text: "Er hat es als 'den Vorfall' beschrieben, etwas äußerst Bemerkenswertes. Offenbar ist es einmal auf dem gesamten Schiff zu einem gewaltigen Systemausfall gekommen. Sämtliche Systeme haben eine Fünftelsekunde lang nicht mehr reagiert. Der Großteil der Crew, mich eingeschlossen, da ich zu dieser Zeit vermutlich an Bord war, hat nichts Ungewöhnliches bemerkt. Aber Techpriester sind sehr empfindsam, was so etwas angeht."
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat es als 'den Vorfall' beschrieben, etwas äußerst Bemerkenswertes. Offenbar ist es einmal auf dem gesamten Schiff zu einem gewaltigen Systemausfall gekommen. Sämtliche Systeme haben eine Fünftelsekunde lang nicht mehr reagiert. Der Großteil der Crew, mich eingeschlossen, da ich zu dieser Zeit vermutlich an Bord war, hat nichts Ungewöhnliches bemerkt. Aber Techpriester sind sehr empfindsam, was so etwas angeht."

languages.text: «Lo describía como "el Incidente", algo verdaderamente excepcional. Por lo visto, la nave sufrió un grave fallo en sus sistemas en el pasado. Todos los sistemas dejaron de responder durante una quinta parte de un segundo. La mayoría de la tripulación, incluyéndome a mí, ya que seguro que estaba a bordo cuando ocurrió, no notamos nada extraño. Pero los tecnosacerdotes perciben mejor esas cosas».
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: «Lo describía como "el Incidente", algo verdaderamente excepcional. Por lo visto, la nave sufrió un grave fallo en sus sistemas en el pasado. Todos los sistemas dejaron de responder durante una quinta parte de un segundo. La mayoría de la tripulación, incluyéndome a mí, ya que seguro que estaba a bordo cuando ocurrió, no notamos nada extraño. Pero los tecnosacerdotes perciben mejor esas cosas».

languages.text: 「彼はそれを『事件』と表現しており、かなり注目すべきものだったようです。過去のある時点で、船全体に大規模なシステム障害が発生した模様です。すべてのシステムが1/5秒間応答できなくなりました。私自身もその時おそらく船にいましたが、私を含め、ほとんどのクルーが何も異変に気付きませんでした。しかし、技術司祭はそのようなことに敏感なのです」
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はそれを『事件』と表現しており、かなり注目すべきものだったようです。過去のある時点で、船全体に大規模なシステム障害が発生した模様です。すべてのシステムが1/5秒間応答できなくなりました。私自身もその時おそらく船にいましたが、私を含め、ほとんどのクルーが何も異変に気付きませんでした。しかし、技術司祭はそのようなことに敏感なのです」

languages.text: "Oldukça olağanüstü bir şeyi 'Hadise' olarak tanımlıyordu. Dediğine göre gemi, geçmişte devasa bir sistem arızası yaşamış. Tüm sistemler saniyenin beşte biri bir süreliğine yanıt vermeyi kesmiş. Ben dâhil çoğu mürettebat o sırada muhtemelen gemideydik ve bir tuhaflık hissetmedik. Tekno Rahipler ise bu tür olaylara karşı hassastır."
languages.original_text: "He was describing it as 'the Incident,' something quite remarkable. Apparently, at some point in the past, the entire ship was hit by a massive system failure. All systems stopped responding for one-fifth of a second. Most of the crew, including myself as I was likely on board at that time, did not notice anything strange. But Tech-Priests are sensitive to such things."

traits.locale_text: "Oldukça olağanüstü bir şeyi 'Hadise' olarak tanımlıyordu. Dediğine göre geçmişte bir keresinde gemi devasa bir sistem arızası yaşamış. Tüm sistemler saniyenin beşte biri bir süreliğine yanıt vermeyi kesmiş. Ben dâhil çoğu mürettebat o sırada muhtemelen gemideydik ve herhangi tuhaf bir şey fark etmedik ama Tekno Rahipler bu tip olaylara karşı hassastır."
